questions.questionTitle: What will the man do on Friday?
What does the woman offer to do for the man?
anwers: Deliver an order to his office

script:
� Hi, Mr. Williams? This is Shana from Superior Catering. Your order for the office party Friday afternoon should be ready by Friday morning.
� Oh good. Is it all right if I pick it up on Thursday? I'll be in a meeting on Friday morning.
� I wouldn't recommend doing that. The food will spoil. We could deliver it to you on Friday morning, if you want. That way it will stay fresh.
� Really? That would be super! Thank you.
